trans-unit.source: Log on to the [Azure portal][], and click **New** at the top left of the screen.
trans-unit.target: Log on to the [Azure portal][], and click **New** at the top left of the screen.

trans-unit.source: In the **Create namespace** blade, enter a namespace name.
trans-unit.target: In the **Create namespace** blade, enter a namespace name.

trans-unit.source: The system immediately checks to see if the name is available.
trans-unit.target: The system immediately checks to see if the name is available.

trans-unit.source: After making sure the namespace name is available, choose the pricing tier (Basic or Standard).
trans-unit.target: After making sure the namespace name is available, choose the pricing tier (Basic or Standard).

trans-unit.source: Also, choose an Azure subscription, resource group, and location in which to create the resource.
trans-unit.target: Also, choose an Azure subscription, resource group, and location in which to create the resource.

trans-unit.source: In the Event Hubs namespace list, click the newly-created namespace.
trans-unit.target: In the Event Hubs namespace list, click the newly-created namespace.

trans-unit.source: In the namespace blade, click **Event Hubs**.
trans-unit.target: In the namespace blade, click **Event Hubs**.

trans-unit.source: At the top of the blade, click **Add Event Hub**.
trans-unit.target: At the top of the blade, click **Add Event Hub**.

trans-unit.source: Type a name for your Event Hub, then click **Create**.
trans-unit.target: Type a name for your Event Hub, then click **Create**.

trans-unit.source: In the list of Event Hubs, click the newly created Event Hub name.
trans-unit.target: In the list of Event Hubs, click the newly created Event Hub name.

trans-unit.source: Back in the namespace blade (not the specific Event Hub blade), click **Shared access policies**, and then click **RootManageSharedAccessKey**.
trans-unit.target: Back in the namespace blade (not the specific Event Hub blade), click **Shared access policies**, and then click **RootManageSharedAccessKey**.

trans-unit.source: Click the copy button to copy the **RootManageSharedAccessKey** connection string to the clipboard.
trans-unit.target: Click the copy button to copy the **RootManageSharedAccessKey** connection string to the clipboard.

trans-unit.source: Save this connection string to use later in the tutorial.
trans-unit.target: Save this connection string to use later in the tutorial.

trans-unit.source: Your Event Hub is now created, and you have the connection strings you need to send and receive events.
trans-unit.target: Your Event Hub is now created, and you have the connection strings you need to send and receive events.
